requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              • Fresher or experience at sales and design.
              
              • Good knowledge of market
              
              • Ability to work under pressure
              
              • Excellent selling skills & communication skills, negotiation, photoshop
              
              • Good communication in English & Vietnamese
              
              • PC skills (Excel, Word, Windows, etc).
              
              • Salary: 700 USD up
              
              • Language preffer for Applications: English
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
